channel.title: Comand Help
channel.description: Ok in basic mopar which i plan to use as a base to change a character look you type ::chara or something else like ::case 146(no thats not the comand but its similar) it brings up the character edit screen and i can change the look of my character but how do I get it to accept my changes to the character graphics?

item.title: Comand Help
item.dc:creator: @Verac Verac
item.description:
@Verac wrote:

Ok in basic mopar which i plan to use as a base to change a character look you type ::chara or something else like ::case 146(no thats not the comand but its similar) it brings up the character edit screen and i can change the look of my character but how do I get it to accept my changes to the character graphics?
